name: Miso Soup with Vermicelli, Mushrooms and Tofu
recipeIngredient: Red kamaboko (steamed fish cake, thinly sliced, for serving)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large stockpot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add vegetable stock, soy sauce, mirin, sake and sugar, whisking to combine. Bring to a boil and stir in miso paste until dissolved, about 1-2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a large stockpot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add vegetable stock, soy sauce, mirin, sake and sugar, whisking to combine. Bring to a boil and stir in miso paste until dissolved, about 1-2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tofu, mushrooms and vermicelli; reduce heat and simmer until noodles are cooked through, about 4-6 minutes. Stir in spinach until wilted, about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tofu, mushrooms and vermicelli; reduce heat and simmer until noodles are cooked through, about 4-6 minutes. Stir in spinach until wilted, about 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately, garnished with hard boiled egg, fish cake and Japanese chili pepper, if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately, garnished with hard boiled egg, fish cake and Japanese chili pepper, if desired.
